form.label: SH - 06 - Dashboards, Reports/Alerts & Lookups Analysis - Dashboard - v1.5.50

| `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)`
| `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)`
| eval Type = if(match(Lookup_File,".csv"), "file", Type) , if(isnull(Lookup_File), "file", Type) , Lookup = if(isnull(Lookup), "NO-DEFINITION", Lookup) | fillnull value="0" Min_Matches disabled | fillnull value="100" Max_Matches | fillnull value="true" Allow_Caching Replicate case_sensitive_match | fillnull value="EXACT" Match_Type | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles app author sharing Lookup Filename Type Collection Lookup_File_Path emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_cc emp_type emp_status | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles3$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance3$" app="$app3$" Lookup="*$Lookup$*" author="$author3$" sharing="$sharing3$" Filename="*$Filename$*" Lookup_File_Path="*$Lookup_File_Path$*" Collection="*$Collection$*" Match_Type="*$Match_Type$*" Type="$Type3$" case_sensitive_match="$case_sensitive_match$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_lob="$emp_lob$" emp_cc="$emp_cc$" work_city="$work_city$" work_region="$work_region$" work_country="$work_country$" Fields_List="*$Fields_List$*"

| `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)`
| `get_identity_info_simple(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)`
| rex field=attribute mode=sed "s/LOOKUP-//g" | fillnull value="Undefined" Splunk_Instance Splunk_Roles app sharing stanza attribute transform overwrite value author
| search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Instance="*$Splunk_Instance$*" Splunk_Roles="*$Splunk_Roles$*" app="$app$" author="$author$" attribute="*$attribute$*" stanza="$stanza$" emp_name="$emp_name$" emp_ttl="$emp_ttl$" emp_lob="$emp_lob$" emp_dep="$emp_dep$" emp_type="$emp_type$" emp_status="$emp_status$" sharing="$sharing$" overwrite="$overwrite$" transform="$transform$"

index=_internal sourcetype=splunk_web_access method=GET status=200 NOT view IN ("home" , "search" , "dashboard*", "alert*" , "check_alerts", "report*" , "field_extractor" , "job_manager" , "dataset*" , "pivot" , "show_source" , "charting" , "data_model*" , "flashtimeline" , "integrity_check_of_installed_files" , "licenseusage" , "live_tail" , "mod_setup" , "orphaned_scheduled_searches") user!="-" | rename view As title host As Splunk_Instance | fields _time Splunk_Instance app title user spent | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_dashboards_info(shcluster_label,app,title)` | search shcluster_label="$shcluster_label$" Splunk_Instance="$Splunk_Instance1$" Splunk_Roles="$Splunk_Roles1$" app="$app1$" title="$title$"
| stats count by Splunk_Roles | rename Splunk_Roles AS Splunk_Roles1
| stats count by Splunk_Instance | rename Splunk_Instance AS Splunk_Instance1
| stats count by app | rename app as app1
| stats count by author | rename author as author1

search.query: | stats count AS "Number of Dashboards" by author | sort 0 - "Number of Dashboards"

panel.title: 5. Number of Dashboards By Employee LOB

search.query: | stats count AS "Number of Dashboards" by emp_lob | sort 0 - "Number of Dashboards"

| eval search=mvdedup(mvsort(search)) | `get_latest_access_human(Days_Latest_Access)` | fields shcluster_label app sharing title label Days_Latest_Access_Display Latest_Access description type dashboard_size author location updated Report_Reference Dashboard_Reference Lookup_Reference Datamodel_Reference Macro_Reference Index_Reference Sourcetype_Reference Source_Reference Eventtype_Reference Rest_Reference BaseSearch search | stats values(*) as * dc(search) as Num_Searches count by shcluster_label app title | eval #=1 | table # shcluster_label app sharing title label Days_Latest_Access_Display Latest_Access description type dashboard_size author location updated Report_Reference Dashboard_Reference Lookup_Reference Datamodel_Reference Macro_Reference Index_Reference Sourcetype_Reference Source_Reference Eventtype_Reference Rest_Reference BaseSearch Num_Searches search | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_reference_fields` | `rename_dashboards_fields`

search.query: | table shcluster_label attribute app stanza updated transform overwrite value author sharing emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_cc emp_type emp_status endDate | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_rest_fields` | rename attribute AS "Automatic Lookup" transform AS "Lookup Definition" overwrite AS "Overwrite Field Values"

panel.title: 7. Users by Dashboard Usage over time

search.query: | stats count by Splunk_Roles | rename Splunk_Roles AS Splunk_Roles1
| stats count by Splunk_Instance | rename Splunk_Instance AS Splunk_Instance1
| stats count by app | rename app as app1

chart.title: Top 10 Most Viewed Dashboards over the selected Time Period: "| timechart limit=0 dc(user) by label useother=false" / Most Used Dashboards In Time Period : "| stats latest(_time) AS latest_access_time dc(user) as "# of Users" values(user) as user values(label) as label count by view app"

search.query: | timechart useother=f fixedrange=f usenull=f $span_period$ dc(user) As Num_Users by title where max in top$top_tok2$
